name: lubelogger
tagline: A self-hosted app for tracking vehicle maintenance and fuel
description: LubeLog helps car owners track maintenance, repairs, and fuel usage across multiple vehicles. Its self-hosted web UI includes reporting and reminders for keeping vehicle service history in one place.

features.title: Fuel Logging
features.description: Fuel consumption, Cost tracking, Efficiency analysis. Monitor fuel usage and expenses

features.title: Data Import
features.description: Scheduled maintenance, Mileage-based alerts, Custom reminders. Never miss important service dates

features.title: File Upload
features.description: Upload receipts, Service documents, Warranty info. Keep all vehicle documents organized

features.title: Data Export
features.description: Maintenance history, Cost summaries, Export data. Generate comprehensive vehicle reports

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Privacy-focused, Full data control, No subscriptions. Own your vehicle maintenance data
